column6: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] quiere prestigio

column2: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] wants Piety
column6: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] quiere Piedad

column2: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] wants trade access to the capital
column6: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] quiere acceso comercial a la capital

column2: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] wants financial support for 5 years
column6: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] quiere ayuda financiera por 5 años

column2: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] wants personal advice on a serious matter
column6: [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] quiere asesoramiento personal sobre un asunto grave

column2: Refuse to perform the favour
column6: Negarse a realizar el favor

column2: You will be subject to the risks of a long distance travel. This can be a risky proposition
column6: Estará sujeto a los riesgos de un viaje de larga distancia. Esta puede ser una propuesta arriesgada

column2: Safe and Sound
column6: Sano y salvo

column2: After spending more than half an year to counsel [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] and repaying the favour I owed [darkages_favoured_char.GetHerHim], I am finally safe in my palace, my duty fulfilled...
column6: Después de pasar más de medio año para aconsejar [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName] y pagar el favor que le debía [darkages_favoured_char.GetHerHim], finalmente estoy a salvo en mi palacio, mi deber cumplió ...

column2: Excellent!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Ungrateful
column6: Ingrato

column6: Este personaje se negó a hacerle un favor a otro personaje

column6: Políticamente comprometido

column2: This character supports an unpopular view sponsored by other character
column6: Este personaje admite una vista impopular patrocinada por otro personaje

column6: Fiscalidad limitada

column6: Esta provincia tiene los impuestos al comercio restringidos

column2: Ambushed!
column6: Emboscado!

column2: As I was travelling the roads  of the lands of [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], at a pronounced bend, my carriage was approached by a few men with bad intentions. One of them told my guards there was a toll to pass on that spot...
column6: Mientras viajaba por los caminos de las tierras de [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], en una curva pronunciada, algunos hombres con malas intenciones se acercaron a mi carruaje. Uno de ellos le dijo a mis guardias que había un peaje que pasar en ese lugar ...

column2: Pay the 'toll'
column6: Paga el 'peaje'

column2: Fight the bandits
column6: Lucha contra los bandidos

column2: Wrong Steps
column6: Pasos equivocados

column2: During my stay with [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], I was required to perform detailed religious rituals of our faith. Unfortunately I made a mess of myself and as a reasult I offended the religious authorities...
column6: Durante mi estancia con [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], se me pidió que realizara rituales religiosos detallados de nuestra fe. Desafortunadamente, me hice un lío y, como resultado, ofendí a las autoridades religiosas ...

column2: During my stay with [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], I was invited to attended a religious cerimony of [darkages_favoured_char.GetHerHis] faith. Unfortunately, not knowing the proper behaviour, I made a mess of myself and as a reasult I offended the religious authorities...
column6: Durante mi estadía con [darkages_favoured_char.GetTitledName], me invitaron a asistir a una ceremonia religiosa de fe [darkages_favoured_char.GetHerHis]. Desafortunadamente, al no conocer el comportamiento correcto, me desordené y, como resultado, ofendí a las autoridades religiosas ...

column2: I guess I must study more my own religion
column6: Supongo que debo estudiar más mi propia religión.

column2: How could I have known such foreign religious habits?
column6: ¿Cómo podría haber conocido tales hábitos religiosos extranjeros?

column2: Influence Election
column6: Elección de influencia

column2: Ask the Doge to influence the future election in your favour. Regarding your character, what influences this decision is: Diplomacy(+-), Intrigue(+-), Patient(+), Ambitious(+), Content(-) and Wroth(-). Regarding the Doge, what influences this action is: Opinion of character(+-), Deceitful(+), Arbitrary(+), Ambitious(+), Greedy(+), Just(-), Honest(-), Temperate(-) and Content(-). The Doge traits Just and Honest strongly influence this action
column6: Pídale al Dux que influya en las elecciones futuras a su favor. Con respecto a su personaje, lo que influye en esta decisión es: Diplomacia (+ -), Intriga (+ -), Paciente (+), Ambicioso (+), Contenido (-) y Wroth (-). Con respecto al Dux, lo que influye en esta acción es: opinión del personaje (+ -), engañosa (+), arbitraria (+), ambiciosa (+), codiciosa (+), justa (-), honesta (-), templada ( -) y Contenido (-). Los rasgos Doge Justos y honestos influyen fuertemente en esta acción

column2: Recently influenced
column6: Influenciado recientemente

column2: Infamy Accrued
column6: Infamia acumulada

column2: Poor Intriguer
column6: Intriguer pobre

column2: An intrigue plot hatched by this character was exposed
column6: Una trama de intriga tramada por este personaje fue expuesta

column2: By ceding whatever the Doge is requesting you'll see a substancial increase in your Prestige, representing an increase in the Respect needed to win the next election for Doge. The chances of gaining more or less Prestige are directly influenced by the Intrigue Stat of the Doge
column6: Al ceder lo que solicite el Doge, verá un aumento sustancial en su Prestigio, lo que representa un aumento en el Respeto necesario para ganar las próximas elecciones para Doge. Las posibilidades de ganar más o menos prestigio están directamente influenciadas por la estadística de intriga del dux

column2: Rigged Elections
column6: Elecciones rigidas

column2: Even if I spent some important gold to buy [From.GetTitledName] a nice painting, [From.GetSheHe] adamantly refused my suggestion to rig the next election in my favour. A botched attempt, it was...
column6: Incluso si gasté un poco de oro importante para comprar [From.GetTitledName] una bonita pintura, [From.GetSheHe] rechazó rotundamente mi sugerencia de manipular las próximas elecciones a mi favor. Un intento fallido, fue ...

column2: After I offered [From.GetHerHim] a very nice painting that cost me precisely 30 gold, [From.GetTitledName] winked at me and accepted my suggestion the next election would be rigged in my favour. Of course, the Doge stated what [From.GetSheHe] wanted for that to happen...
column6: Después de ofrecerle a [From.GetHerHim] una pintura muy bonita que me costó exactamente 30 de oro, [From.GetTitledName] me guiñó un ojo y aceptó mi sugerencia de que la próxima elección sería manipulada a mi favor. Por supuesto, el Dux dijo lo que [From.GetSheHe] quería para que eso sucediera ...

column2: Better if I didn't attempt anything...
column6: Mejor si no intento nada ...

column2: A paltry sum of gold...
column6: Una insignificante suma de oro ...

column2: A moderate sum of gold...
column6: Una suma moderada de oro ...

column2: A large sum of gold...
column6: Una gran suma de oro ...

column2: One of my trade posts
column6: Una de mis publicaciones comerciales

column2: Two of my trade posts
column6: Dos de mis publicaciones comerciales

column2: I will not accept the deal
column6: No aceptaré el trato

column2: Leaked Secret
column6: Secreto filtrado

column2: After I asked the Doge to use [From.GetHerHis] influence to rig the next election in my favour, my mind was put at rest as I thought the secret was well kept. Unfortunately, someone leaked the secret and the knowledge about my actions is now spread among the whole court...
column6: Después de que le pedí al Dux que usara la influencia de [From.GetHerHis] para manipular las próximas elecciones a mi favor, me quedé en silencio porque pensé que el secreto estaba bien guardado. Desafortunadamente, alguien filtró el secreto y el conocimiento sobre mis acciones ahora se extiende entre toda la corte ...

column2: Bad news, indeed...
column6: Malas noticias, de hecho ...

column2: On top of the penalties below, the chance that [From.GetTitledName] accepts your request to influence the election is now lower due to the scandal of the action
column6: Además de las penalizaciones a continuación, la posibilidad de que [From.GetTitledName] acepte su solicitud para influir en la elección ahora es menor debido al escándalo de la acción

column2: Corrupt Temptation
column6: Tentación corrupta

column2: Early in the morning I was approached by none other than [da_corrupt_patrician.GetTitledName] with a strange plea about rigging the next election for Doge. Faced with a moral dilemma, I must now decide the answer...
column6: Temprano en la mañana, nada más que [da_corrupt_patrician.GetTitledName] con una extraña súplica sobre manipular las próximas elecciones para Doge. Frente a un dilema moral, ahora debo decidir la respuesta ...

column2: I am above these tricks
column6: Estoy por encima de estos trucos

column2: I'll let the gold speak!
column6: ¡Dejaré que hable el oro!

column2: I'll expand my domains
column6: Expandiré mis dominios

column2: A Council Debate
column6: Un debate del consejo

column2: Through my ability to explain my ideas and the persuasive nature of my words I was able to win a political debate I had against my Liege that now owes me a favour...
column6: Gracias a mi capacidad para explicar mis ideas y la naturaleza persuasiva de mis palabras, pude ganar un debate político que tuve contra mi Lieja que ahora me debe un favor ...

column2: These are good news!
column6: Estas son buenas noticias!

column2: A Council Debate
column6: Un debate del consejo

column2: Although I displayed significant ability to explain my ideas, my skill was not enough to warrant me a victory in a political debate I had with my Liege. Unfortunately and as my political stance was compromised, I owe him a favour now...
column6: Aunque mostré una capacidad significativa para explicar mis ideas, mi habilidad no fue suficiente para garantizarme una victoria en un debate político que tuve con mi Lieja. Desafortunadamente y como mi postura política se vio comprometida, ahora le debo un favor ...

column2: I'll win next time...
column6: Ganaré la próxima vez ...

column2: You plan to get a small baby has your faked offspring. You can then educate him as you see fit
column6: Planea tener un bebé pequeño con su descendencia falsa. Luego puedes educarlo como mejor te parezca

column2: You plan to get a child has your faked offspring. You can still influence his education
column6: Planea tener un hijo con su descendencia falsa. Todavía puedes influir en su educación

column2: You plan to get a young adult as your faked offspring. He will be ready to fully inherit your titles
column6: Planea tener un adulto joven como su descendencia falsa. Él estará listo para heredar completamente tus títulos

column2: Dubious Blood
column6: Sangre dudosa

column2: There are lingering doubts about the true ancestry of this character
column6: Hay dudas persistentes sobre la verdadera ascendencia de este personaje

column2: A New Heir
column6: Un nuevo heredero

column2: My quest to find a new heir started with a word with an artist that lives nearby. This man sent me word of a indigent woman that was willing to sell me her baby for a single gold coin. When I first checked the child, I sensed him lethargic and poorly fed...
column6: Mi búsqueda para encontrar un nuevo heredero comenzó con una palabra con un artista que vive cerca. Este hombre me envió un mensaje sobre una mujer indigente que estaba dispuesta a venderme a su bebé por una sola moneda de oro. Cuando revisé al niño por primera vez, lo sentí letárgico y mal alimentado ...

column2: When I set myself to cheat destiny and find a new heir, I started with a matron that ran a very special business. In fact she kept around several children that were dropped at her door by the parents without means to feed them. As I approached the candidate to be my heir, I could not escape a sense of foreboding...
column6: Cuando me propuse engañar al destino y encontrar un nuevo heredero, comencé con una matrona que manejaba un negocio muy especial. De hecho, ella mantenía a varios niños que los padres dejaron caer en su puerta sin medios para alimentarlos. Cuando me acerqué al candidato para ser mi heredero, no pude escapar de una sensación de presentimiento ...

column2: I started my quest to find an heir by giving a word to my [Root.job_spiritual.GetJobTitle] and [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] was quick to point me to a happy family that was taking care of a baby recently found abandoned near the river. As I stared this child, he looked back smiled at me...
column6: Comencé mi búsqueda para encontrar un heredero dándole una palabra a mi [Root.job_spiritual.GetJobTitle] y [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] se apresuró a señalarme a una familia feliz que estaba cuidando a un bebé recientemente encontrado abandonado cerca del río. Mientras miraba a este niño, me miró y me sonrió ...

column2: I had a discreet word with an acquaitance of mine regarding my quest to find an heir and she was quick to present me with a small baby. As I hold him in my arms, he cried aloud...
column6: Tuve una palabra discreta con un conocido mío sobre mi búsqueda para encontrar un heredero y ella se apresuró a presentarme un bebé pequeño. Mientras lo sostengo en mis brazos, lloró en voz alta ...

column2: To find the boy that will be my heir I went to the most destitute slums of my demesne. There, among putrid smells and the most appaling misery, I found a drunken man willing to give me his own son. The kid's stare was as empty as his stomach...
column6: Para encontrar al chico que será mi heredero, fui a los barrios más pobres de mi barrio. Allí, entre olores pútridos y la miseria más espantosa, encontré a un hombre borracho dispuesto a darme su propio hijo. La mirada del niño estaba tan vacía como su estómago ...

column2: As I went around my demesne in my solitary quest to find a new heir, a woman that was infamous as a witch presented me with her own younger offspring. She was willing to part with him as long as I gave her my left hand for a potion of her own making. Talking with the kid, something seemed to be amiss...
column6: Mientras daba vueltas por mi casa en mi búsqueda solitaria para encontrar un nuevo heredero, una mujer que era infame como una bruja me presentó su propia descendencia más joven. Estaba dispuesta a separarse de él siempre que le diera mi mano izquierda por una poción de su propia creación. Hablando con el niño, algo parecía estar mal ...

column2: When I first set myself the task of finding a new heir, I immediately thought about my [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] and his small minions that were his ears among my demesne. As a personal favour, [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] picked the best of his kids, some orphan with a sad story behind him, and presented the kid to me...
column6: Cuando me propuse por primera vez la tarea de encontrar un nuevo heredero, inmediatamente pensé en mi [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] y sus pequeños secuaces que eran sus oídos entre mi demesne. Como un favor personal, [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] escogió al mejor de sus hijos, algunos huérfanos con una triste historia detrás de él, y me lo presentó ...

column2: As I was mulling about how could I fake a new heir, an unexpected opportunity smiled at me in the form of a distant cousin that paid me a visit. Basically, he was willing to get rid of his own bastard as he didn't want anyone posing a future danger to his own legitimate offspring...
column6: Mientras reflexionaba sobre cómo podría fingir un nuevo heredero, una oportunidad inesperada me sonrió en forma de un primo lejano que me hizo una visita. Básicamente, estaba dispuesto a deshacerse de su propio bastardo, ya que no quería que nadie representara un peligro futuro para su propia descendencia legítima ...

column2: Ohhhh! He has exactly my eyes!
column6: Ohhhh! ¡Tiene exactamente mis ojos!

column2: Stop this nonsense
column6: Deja de estas tonterías

column2: You will see your new heir in your character sheet when you press this option
column6: Verás a tu nuevo heredero en tu hoja de personaje cuando presiones esta opción

column2: You stop the search for a faked heir
column6: Detiene la búsqueda de un heredero falso

column2: The Strangest of Quests
column6: El más extraño de las misiones

column2: Without a successor of my bloodline and instead of bowing to despair, I decided to search for an impostor that can pose to be my bastard heir. Now it is the time to decide about who am I searching for. The younger the candidate, the bigger the chance of success and the higher the influence I'll have over his personality but the younger he is, the higher the risk of an early disaster with him...
column6: Sin un sucesor de mi línea de sangre y en lugar de inclinarme ante la desesperación, decidí buscar un impostor que pudiera ser mi heredero bastardo. Ahora es el momento de decidir a quién estoy buscando. Cuanto más joven sea el candidato, mayores serán las posibilidades de éxito y mayor será la influencia que tendré sobre su personalidad, pero cuanto más joven sea, mayor será el riesgo de un desastre temprano con él ...

column2: I will be searching for a baby
column6: Estaré buscando un bebé

column2: I will be searching for a kid
column6: Estaré buscando un niño

column2: I will be searching for a young adult
column6: Estaré buscando un adulto joven

column2: Illegitimate heir
column6: Heredero ilegítimo

column2: Recently tried to fake an heir
column6: Recientemente intenté fingir un heredero

column2: Forge Bastard Son
column6: Forjar hijo bastardo

column2: As the time passes and you don't seem capable of generating a son, you can try to fake one to assure the continuity of your lineage. Your Intrigue(+-), being Deceitful(+) and being Just(-) play a significant role if you take this decision
column6: A medida que pasa el tiempo y no pareces capaz de generar un hijo, puedes intentar fingir uno para asegurar la continuidad de tu linaje. Su intriga (+ -), ser engañoso (+) y ser justo (-) juegan un papel importante si toma esta decisión

column2: My quest to find a new heir lead to a dead end. Unfortunately I was unable to summon anyone, even if I tried really hard. In the end, the lack of a legal male heir weights over my shoulders and I feel deeply troubled...
column6: Mi búsqueda para encontrar un nuevo heredero condujo a un callejón sin salida. Desafortunadamente no pude convocar a nadie, incluso si lo intenté realmente. Al final, la falta de un heredero masculino legal pesa sobre mis hombros y me siento profundamente preocupado ...

column2: How am I going to overcome this feeling?
column6: ¿Cómo voy a superar este sentimiento?

column2: Despondent
column6: Abatido

column2: This character recently suffered a significant setback in life that filled him with a sense of despair
column6: Este personaje recientemente sufrió un revés significativo en la vida que lo llenó de una sensación de desesperación.

column2: Stop this nonsense!
column6: ¡Basta de tonterías!

column2: Ohhhh! He has exactly my eyes!
column6: Ohhhh! ¡Tiene exactamente mis ojos!

column2: A New Heir
column6: Un nuevo heredero

column2: After months seeking a candidate to be my fake adult son, I finally discovered a good option willing to do my bidding in a dark drinking hole. With his thougths obnubilated by the stupor of the alchool, this 18 year old man agreed to my proposal and promised to behave responsibly after being presented to the Court...
column6: Después de meses de buscar un candidato para ser mi falso hijo adulto, finalmente descubrí una buena opción dispuesta a hacer mi apuesta en un oscuro pozo para beber. Con sus pensamientos obnubilados por el estupor de la escuela, este hombre de 18 años aceptó mi propuesta y prometió comportarse de manera responsable después de ser presentado a la Corte ...

column2: After months seeking a candidate to be my fake adult son, I finally met someone who told me of a good candidate living not far from my palace. Desperate with my quest, I promptly agreed with the arrangement. Now that I finally set my sights on the 20 year old candidate, I am not so sure about how will he fit in the Court...
column6: Después de meses buscando un candidato para ser mi falso hijo adulto, finalmente conocí a alguien que me habló de un buen candidato que vivía cerca de mi palacio. Desesperado con mi búsqueda, acepté de inmediato el acuerdo. Ahora que finalmente puse mi mirada en el candidato de 20 años, no estoy tan seguro de cómo encajará en la Corte ...

column2: After months seeking a candidate to be my fake adult son, I finally discovered the perfect match, even if in a indirect way. As fate has it, the 16 years old candidate is an imbecile and seldom does any talking. This can be a curse... or a blessing. Cynical comments not withstanding, unfortunately this was the best candidate I managed to find...
column6: Después de meses buscando un candidato para ser mi falso hijo adulto, finalmente descubrí la pareja perfecta, incluso de manera indirecta. Según el destino, el candidato de 16 años es un imbécil y rara vez habla. Esto puede ser una maldición ... o una bendición. A pesar de los comentarios cínicos, desafortunadamente este fue el mejor candidato que pude encontrar ...

column2: I finally discovered the perfect match for my search in a  16 years old boy raised by a happy family of farmers. He was discovered on the other side of my demenesne, after being found abandoned as a baby, close to an unremarkable stream. This man seems quite sound, someone who can keep an interesting conversation for long....
column6: Finalmente descubrí la combinación perfecta para mi búsqueda en un niño de 16 años criado por una feliz familia de granjeros. Fue descubierto al otro lado de mi demenesne, después de ser encontrado abandonado como un bebé, cerca de una corriente poco notable. Este hombre parece bastante sano, alguien que puede mantener una conversación interesante por mucho tiempo ...

column2: After months seeking a candidate to be my fake adult son, I was surprised when approached by a 22 years old, with a sly smile claiming to be my son. As it turned out, he was informed of my quest and says he is all I could expect. With his scheme presented in a clear way, I could not escape the feeling this Master Schemer is the perfect candidate to reach whatever goals he set...
column6: Después de meses de buscar un candidato para ser mi falso hijo adulto, me sorprendió cuando un joven de 22 años se me acercó, con una sonrisa astuta que decía ser mi hijo. Al final resultó que, él fue informado de mi búsqueda y dice que él es todo lo que podía esperar. Con su esquema presentado de una manera clara, no pude escapar de la sensación de que este Master Schemer es el candidato perfecto para alcanzar los objetivos que se propuso ...

column2: I was surprised to find the right candidate to be my fake 'son' within my own retinue. Orphan and a sort of mistery to all around him, after I tal,kked with him for a long time this 19 years old seems willing to play the role of my long lost son. I feel lucky to have found such a great candidate...
column6: Me sorprendió encontrar al candidato adecuado para ser mi falso 'hijo' dentro de mi séquito. Huérfano y una especie de misterio para todos a su alrededor, después de haber conversado con él durante mucho tiempo, este joven de 19 años parece dispuesto a desempeñar el papel de mi hijo perdido hace mucho tiempo. Me siento afortunado de haber encontrado un gran candidato ...

column2: I found the right candidate to be my fake 'son' in a tavern, where this 17 year old was acting as a minstrel reciting poetry. Besides his penchant for poetry, a long talk with him unfortunately revealed a very unpleasant personality. Certainly, only the survival of my lineage forces me to tolerate such character...
column6: Encontré al candidato adecuado para ser mi 'hijo' falso en una taberna, donde este joven de 17 años estaba actuando como un trovador recitando poesía. Además de su afición por la poesía, una larga conversación con él desafortunadamente reveló una personalidad muy desagradable. Ciertamente, solo la supervivencia de mi linaje me obliga a tolerar ese carácter ...

column2: I finally found a great character to be my new 'son' in a  19 year old who knows everything there is to know about dispatching a soul to kingdom come. Curiosly he left an impression of being extremely principled in his approach to life. As each man is nothing more than an unsolved paradox, I think again before committing to this course of action...
column6: Finalmente encontré un gran personaje para ser mi nuevo 'hijo' en un joven de 19 años que sabe todo lo que hay que saber sobre el envío de un alma al reino venidero. Curiosamente dejó la impresión de ser extremadamente de principios en su enfoque de la vida. Como cada hombre no es más que una paradoja sin resolver, pienso nuevamente antes de comprometerme con este curso de acción ...

column2: I was surprised the one candidate I could find was a 20 years old orphan dwarf that was willing to play the role of my newfound 'son'. One of the first things he showed me was an ugly scar he has in a leg, the result of fighting some local bandits plaguing my demesne. It is clear this dwarf is delighted about the lottery he won and has such, I believe he will truly behave in Court...
column6: Me sorprendió que el único candidato que pude encontrar era un enano huérfano de 20 años que estaba dispuesto a desempeñar el papel de mi recién descubierto "hijo". Una de las primeras cosas que me mostró fue una cicatriz fea que tiene en una pierna, el resultado de luchar contra unos bandidos locales que plagan mi demonio. Está claro que este enano está encantado con la lotería que ganó y tiene tal, creo que realmente se comportará en la corte ...

column2: Through the good graces of a known priest, I was presented to a most singular man, a candidate to be my fake 'son'. This blind man, an orphan that was living since his childhood with a group of monks, seemed well educated and very polite. Barely believing his luck, he claims to be willing to play his new role in life. It is now the time for me to face the decision...
column6: Gracias a las buenas gracias de un sacerdote conocido, me presentaron a un hombre muy singular, un candidato para ser mi falso 'hijo'. Este ciego, un huérfano que vivía desde su infancia con un grupo de monjes, parecía bien educado y muy educado. Apenas creyendo en su suerte, afirma estar dispuesto a desempeñar su nuevo papel en la vida. Ahora es el momento de enfrentar la decisión ...

column2: You attempt to kill all the bandits and save your gold
column6: Intentas matar a todos los bandidos y guardar tu oro

column2: You attempt to escape from the bandits attacking only in self defence
column6: Intentas escapar de los bandidos atacando solo en defensa propia

column2: Dispatch everybody without being wounded
column6: Despacha a todos sin ser herido

column2: Escape in safety
column6: Escapar en seguridad

column2: Ambushed!
column6: Emboscado!

column2: As I discreetly travelled alone across my realm in order to find someone who is willing to be my fake heir, I was ambushed by a group of bandits with plans to ask for a ransom using me as bait...
column6: Mientras viajaba discretamente solo a través de mi reino para encontrar a alguien que esté dispuesto a ser mi heredero falso, un grupo de bandidos me tendió una emboscada con planes de pedir un rescate usándome como cebo ...

column2: Kill all this scum
column6: Mata toda esta escoria

column2: Try to escape
column6: Intenta escapar

column2: Surrender
column6: Rendición

column2: You surrender and wait for the ransom to be paid
column6: Te rindes y esperas a que se pague el rescate

column2: The bandits act dishonorably and kill you anyway
column6: Los bandidos actúan deshonrosamente y te matan de todos modos

column2: Liar
column6: Mentiroso

column2: Unexpected Help
column6: Ayuda inesperada

column2: As I set in motion my plan to 'fabricate' a male heir, in spite of my discretion, my [Root.job_chancellor.GetJobTitle] became aware of my scheme and offered to help by setting up a nerwork of informers that could increase my chances to be successful. There is a hefty price tag to hire so many people however...
column6: Cuando puse en marcha mi plan para 'fabricar' un heredero masculino, a pesar de mi discreción, mi [Root.job_chancellor.GetJobTitle] se dio cuenta de mi esquema y se ofreció a ayudarme creando un grupo de informantes que podrían aumentar mis posibilidades para tener éxito. Sin embargo, hay un alto precio para contratar a tanta gente ...

column2: Seems a great idea, [da_chancellor.GetTitledName]!
column6: Parece una gran idea, [da_chancellor.GetTitledName]!

column2: I am not searching for a fake heir!
column6: ¡No estoy buscando un heredero falso!

column2: A Resourceful Spymaster
column6: Un ingenioso maestro de espías

column2: In spite of my discretion as I try to find a good candidate to be my new male heir, I was approached by my [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] who suggested to use [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] network of informers to increase my chances of success. This comes at a price, however: with so many people knowing about my quest, information might be leaked with disastrous results for my objective...
column6: A pesar de mi discreción al tratar de encontrar un buen candidato para ser mi nuevo heredero masculino, mi [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] se me acercó y me sugirió usar la red de informadores [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] para aumentar mis posibilidades. del éxito. Sin embargo, esto tiene un precio: con tantas personas que conocen mi búsqueda, la información podría filtrarse con resultados desastrosos para mi objetivo ...

column2: Seems a great idea, [da_spymaster.GetTitledName]!
column6: Parece una gran idea, [da_spymaster.GetTitledName]!

column2: I think two are already way too many to know about this secret...
column6: Creo que dos ya son demasiados para saber sobre este secreto ...

column2: The plan works
column6: El plan funciona

column2: Information gets leaked
column6: La información se filtra

column2: The success chance of this option is influenced by your Realm Intrigue(+-)
column6: La posibilidad de éxito de esta opción está influenciada por su Intriga de Reino (+ -)

column2: Nosy Spouse
column6: Cónyuge entrometido

column2: Soon after I set my plan to find a new male heir in motion, I noticed my wife started acting strangely around me. When confronted with such peculiar behaviour, she reacted poorly and threw a fit, claiming she would do everything in her power to prevent me from being successful. With my private life suffering, I proceed with my quest to continue my bloodline...
column6: Poco después de establecer mi plan para encontrar un nuevo heredero masculino en movimiento, noté que mi esposa comenzó a actuar de manera extraña a mi alrededor. Cuando se enfrentó a un comportamiento tan peculiar, reaccionó mal y lanzó un ataque, alegando que haría todo lo que estuviera en su poder para evitar que tuviera éxito. Con mi vida privada sufriendo, procedo con mi búsqueda para continuar mi línea de sangre ...

column2: Soon after I set my plan to find a new male heir in motion, I noticed my husband started acting strangely around me. When confronted with such peculiar behaviour, he reacted poorly and threw a fit, claiming he would do everything in his power to prevent me from being successful. With my private life suffering, I proceed with my quest to continue my bloodline...
column6: Poco después de establecer mi plan para encontrar un nuevo heredero masculino en movimiento, noté que mi esposo comenzó a actuar de manera extraña a mi alrededor. Cuando se enfrentó a un comportamiento tan peculiar, reaccionó mal y lanzó un ataque, alegando que haría todo lo que estuviera en su poder para evitar que tuviera éxito. Con mi vida privada sufriendo, procedo con mi búsqueda para continuar mi línea de sangre ...

column2: I'll prevail in the end!
column6: ¡Al final prevaleceré!

column2: With your wife sabotaging your efforts on your back, the chances to find a fake heir are lowered
column6: Con su esposa saboteando sus esfuerzos en su espalda, las posibilidades de encontrar un heredero falso se reducen

column2: Parents' Gift
column6: Regalo de los padres

column2: Thanks to my parents' high diplomatic abilities, I may be gifted with an increase of my Diplomacy stat
column6: Gracias a las altas habilidades diplomáticas de mis padres, puedo recibir un aumento en mi estadística de Diplomacia

column2: Great!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Your parents' total high relevant stat when you were born will possibly increase your own stat. Starting at 15, the higher your progenitor stat, the higher the possible bonus you receive, up to a maximum of +3. If you see two tests in the tooltip, it means both parents contributed with their high stats. Consider yourself very lucky in this latest case
column6: La estadística relevante alta total de tus padres cuando naciste posiblemente aumentará tu propia estadística. A partir de 15, cuanto mayor sea tu estadística de progenitor, mayor será la bonificación posible que recibas, hasta un máximo de +3. Si ve dos pruebas en la información sobre herramientas, significa que ambos padres contribuyeron con sus estadísticas altas. Considérate muy afortunado en este último caso

column2: Parents' Gift
column6: Regalo de los padres

column2: Thanks to my parents' high martial abilities, I may be gifted with an increase of my Martial stat
column6: Gracias a las altas habilidades marciales de mis padres, puedo recibir un aumento de mi estadística marcial

column2: Great!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Parents' Gift
column6: Regalo de los padres

column2: Thanks to my parents' high stewardship abilities, I may be gifted with an increase of my Stewardship stat
column6: Gracias a las altas habilidades de mayordomía de mis padres, puedo recibir un aumento en mi estadística de mayordomía

column2: Great!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Parents' Gift
column6: Regalo de los padres

column2: Thanks to my parents' high intrigue abilities, I may be gifted with an increase of my Intrigue stat
column6: Gracias a las altas habilidades de intriga de mis padres, puedo recibir un aumento en mi estadística de Intriga

column2: Great!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Parents' Gift
column6: Regalo de los padres

column2: Thanks to my parents' high learning abilities, I may be gifted with an increase of my Learning stat
column6: Gracias a las altas habilidades de aprendizaje de mis padres, puedo recibir un aumento en mi estadística de aprendizaje

column2: Great!
column6: ¡Excelente!

column2: Parents's Liability
column6: Responsabilidad de los padres

column2: Due to my parents' low diplomacy abilities, I may suffer a penalty in my Diplomacy stat
column6: Debido a la baja capacidad de diplomacia de mis padres, puedo sufrir una penalización en mi estadística de Diplomacia

column2: Unfortunately...
column6: Desafortunadamente...

column2: Your parents' total low relevant stat when you were born will possibly decrease your own stat. The lower your progenitor stat, the higher the possible penalty you receive, up to a maximum of -3. If you see two tests in the tooltip, it means both parents contributed with their low stats. Consider yourself very unlucky in this latest case
column6: La estadística baja relevante total de sus padres cuando nació posiblemente disminuirá su propia estadística. Cuanto menor sea tu estadística de progenitor, mayor será la posible penalización que recibas, hasta un máximo de -3. Si ve dos pruebas en la información sobre herramientas, significa que ambos padres contribuyeron con sus estadísticas bajas. Considérate muy desafortunado en este último caso

column2: Words of Deceitful Wisdom
column6: Palabras de sabiduría engañosa

column2: My tireless [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] approached me recently with a suggestion that sent me a cold shiver down my spine. As I lack a male heir, I can take the decision to fake one using subterfuge and a big lie to be assured my bloodline will continue in the future. Aghast at first upon earing such suggestion, I now toy with my [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle]'s idea...
column6: Mi incansable [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] se acercó a mí recientemente con una sugerencia que me envió un escalofrío por la espalda. Como no tengo un heredero masculino, puedo tomar la decisión de fingir uno usando subterfugios y una gran mentira para asegurarme de que mi línea de sangre continuará en el futuro. Al principio horrorizado al escuchar tal sugerencia, ahora jugueteo con la idea de mi [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] ...

column2: My industrious [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle], ever worried about myself, approached me again mentioning the nagging issue of my succession and how I still don't have a male heir. As stated before, I can take the decision to fake one using subterfuge and a big lie to be assured my bloodline will continue in the future...
column6: Mi laborioso [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle], siempre preocupado por mí mismo, se acercó a mí nuevamente y me mencionó el problema persistente de mi sucesión y cómo todavía no tengo un heredero masculino. Como se dijo anteriormente, puedo tomar la decisión de falsificar uno usando subterfugio y una gran mentira para asegurarme de que mi línea de sangre continuará en el futuro ...

column2: My dear [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle], approached me yet again, stating that time doesn't stop and I should consider the option to forge a new heir, as nature was unable to let me have one alive as of today. Moral and political considerations not withstanding, I think deeply about this prospect...
column6: Mi querido [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle], se acercó a mí una vez más, indicando que el tiempo no se detiene y que debería considerar la opción de forjar un nuevo heredero, ya que la naturaleza no podía dejarme tener uno vivo a partir de hoy. A pesar de las consideraciones morales y políticas, pienso profundamente en esta perspectiva ...

column2: It is something to consider...
column6: Es algo a tener en cuenta ...

column2: Attacked by Liege
column6: Atacado por Lieja

column2: Paranoid No More
column6: Paranoico No Más

column2: Thanks to my mild condition and my own decision to disengage from the pressures of leading the country, my paranoia seems to be in remission. Gone were the days of suffering and self doubt. In fact I never felt so well in my whole life!
column6: Gracias a mi condición leve y mi propia decisión de retirarme de las presiones de liderar el país, mi paranoia parece estar en remisión. Atrás quedaron los días de sufrimiento y dudas. ¡De hecho, nunca me sentí tan bien en toda mi vida!

column2: I am now Wary!
column6: Ahora soy cauteloso!

column2: You proceed carefully and maximize your chances of success at the cost of a lower effect (-45 opinion) and if unsuccessful, no additional penalties. After picking this option you can now unpause the game. The factors influencing the outcome of this option are for the player character: Intrigue Stat(+-), Master Schemer(+), Deceitful(+) and Arbitrary(+). Regarding [da_target.GetTitledName] factors are: Liege's Realm Intrigue(-), Intrigue Education(-), Wary(-), Master Schemer(-), Silver Tongue(-), Bright(-), Quick(-), Genius(-), Shrewd(-), Trusting(+), Dim(+), Slow(+), Imbecile(+) and Dull(+). Regarding [da_source.GetTitledName], the factors that influence are: Trusting(+), Wary(-) and Realm Intrigue(-). Realm Intrigue only applies if the player is not the Liege of the characters
column6: Procedes con cuidado y maximizas tus posibilidades de éxito a costa de un efecto más bajo (-45 opinión) y, si no tiene éxito, no hay penalizaciones adicionales. Después de elegir esta opción, ahora puedes pausar el juego. Los factores que influyen en el resultado de esta opción son para el personaje del jugador: Intriga Stat (+ -), Master Schemer (+), Engañoso (+) y Arbitrario (+). Con respecto a [da_target.GetTitledName] los factores son: Intriga del Reino de Lieja (-), Educación de Intriga (-), Cauteloso (-), Maquinador Maestro (-), Lengua de Plata (-), Brillante (-), Rápido (-), Genio (-), Sagaz (-), Confiando (+), Dim (+), Lento (+), Imbecil (+) y Sin brillo (+). Con respecto a [da_source.GetTitledName], los factores que influyen son: Confianza (+), Cautela (-) e Intriga del Reino (-). La intriga del reino solo se aplica si el jugador no es el Liege de los personajes

column2: You proceed aggressively and trade your chances of success for a higher effect (-65 opinion) and if unsuccessful you'll be detected. After picking this option you can now unpause the game. The factors influencing the outcome of this option are for the player character: Intrigue Stat(+-), Master Schemer(+), Deceitful(+) and Arbitrary(+). Regarding [da_target.GetTitledName] factors are: Liege's Realm Intrigue(-), Intrigue Education(-), Wary(-), Master Schemer(-), Silver Tongue(-), Bright(-), Quick(-), Genius(-), Shrewd(-), Trusting(+), Dim(+), Slow(+), Imbecile(+) and Dull(+). Regarding [da_source.GetTitledName], the factors that influence are: Trusting(+), Wary(-) and Realm Intrigue(-). Realm Intrigue only applies if the player is not the Liege of the characters
column6: Procedes agresivamente y cambias tus posibilidades de éxito por un efecto mayor (-65 opinión) y si no tienes éxito serás detectado. Después de elegir esta opción, ahora puedes pausar el juego. Los factores que influyen en el resultado de esta opción son para el personaje del jugador: Intriga Stat (+ -), Master Schemer (+), Engañoso (+) y Arbitrario (+). Con respecto a [da_target.GetTitledName] los factores son: Intriga del Reino de Lieja (-), Educación de Intriga (-), Cauteloso (-), Maquinador Maestro (-), Lengua de Plata (-), Brillante (-), Rápido (-), Genio (-), Sagaz (-), Confiando (+), Dim (+), Lento (+), Imbecil (+) y Sin brillo (+). Con respecto a [da_source.GetTitledName], los factores que influyen son: Confianza (+), Cautela (-) e Intriga del Reino (-). La intriga del reino solo se aplica si el jugador no es el Liege de los personajes

column2: You throw caution to the wind but if your plan is successful [da_source.GetTitledName] and [da_target.GetTitledName] will become rivals (-100 opinion). If unsuccessful you will face strong consequences for your action. After picking this option you can now unpause the game. The factors influencing the outcome of this option are for the player character: Intrigue Stat(+-), Master Schemer(+), Deceitful(+) and Arbitrary(+). Regarding [da_target.GetTitledName] factors are: Liege's Realm Intrigue(-), Intrigue Education(-), Wary(-), Master Schemer(-), Silver Tongue(-), Bright(-), Quick(-), Genius(-), Shrewd(-), Trusting(+), Dim(+), Slow(+), Imbecile(+) and Dull(+). Regarding [da_source.GetTitledName], the factors that influence are: Trusting(+), Wary(-) and Realm Intrigue(-). Realm Intrigue only applies if the player is not the Liege of the characters
column6: Lanzas precaución al viento, pero si tu plan tiene éxito [da_source.GetTitledName] y [da_target.GetTitledName] se convertirán en rivales (-100 opinión). Si no tiene éxito, enfrentará fuertes consecuencias por su acción. Después de elegir esta opción, ahora puedes pausar el juego. Los factores que influyen en el resultado de esta opción son para el personaje del jugador: Intriga Stat (+ -), Master Schemer (+), Engañoso (+) y Arbitrario (+). Con respecto a [da_target.GetTitledName] los factores son: Intriga del Reino de Lieja (-), Educación de Intriga (-), Cauteloso (-), Maquinador Maestro (-), Lengua de Plata (-), Brillante (-), Rápido (-), Genio (-), Sagaz (-), Confiando (+), Dim (+), Lento (+), Imbecil (+) y Sin brillo (+). column2: Recently attempted to poison relations

column2: Poison Relations (Target)
column6: Relaciones de envenenamiento (objetivo)

column2: You can attempt to drastically lower the opinion of someone in your diplomatic range about [Root.Character.GetTitledName]. After selecting the 'target' of your intrigue - in this case, [Root.Character.GetTitledName] - you can then proceed to pick the character you want to degrade the opinion of the target - designated 'source'. To enact this decision, you must have the game paused until instructed in a following event to unpause it.
column6: Puede intentar reducir drásticamente la opinión de alguien en su rango diplomático sobre [Root.Character.GetTitledName]. Después de seleccionar el 'objetivo' de su intriga, en este caso, [Root.Character.GetTitledName], puede proceder a elegir el personaje que desea degradar la opinión del objetivo, designado como 'fuente'. Para promulgar esta decisión, debes pausar el juego hasta que se te indique en el siguiente evento que lo pause.

column6: ¡Estoy eufórico con el éxito de mi astuto plan! \n¡Me felicito al ver una disminución muy significativa en la opinión que da [da_source.GetTitledName] sobre [da_target.GetTitledName]!

column2: Situational Awareness
column6: Conciencia situacional

column2: This character has the capability to be aware of the tactical challenges around him, prioritizing correctly the most threatening ones
column6: Este personaje tiene la capacidad de estar al tanto de los desafíos tácticos a su alrededor, priorizando correctamente los más amenazantes.

column2: Weapon Training
column6: Entrenamiento de armas

column2: You can develop your combat rating by training personal combat. While you don't know your true potencial, at the very least you will manage to understand the rudiments of combat, giving you a fighting chance on those moments where the blade of your trusty sword is all that separates you between life and death
column6: Puedes desarrollar tu clasificación de combate entrenando combate personal. Si bien no conoces tu verdadero potencial, al menos lograrás comprender los rudimentos del combate, dándote una oportunidad de pelear en esos momentos donde la espada de tu espada de confianza es todo lo que te separa entre la vida y la muerte.

column2: You train with caution and avoid placing your body under severe strain. Results of the train will take longer on average and you'll be less prone to injury. The older you are the higher the chances for injury
column6: Entrena con precaución y evita colocar su cuerpo bajo una tensión severa. Los resultados del tren tomarán más tiempo en promedio y será menos propenso a sufrir lesiones. Cuanto mayor sea, mayores serán las posibilidades de lesiones

column2: You will follow a gruelling schedule in your combat training. You can expect faster results on average but also a bigger chance to suffer injuries too. The older you are the higher the chances for injury
column6: Seguirás un horario agotador en tu entrenamiento de combate. Puede esperar resultados más rápidos en promedio, pero también una mayor posibilidad de sufrir lesiones. Cuanto mayor sea, mayores serán las posibilidades de lesiones

column2: Moderate Training
column6: Entrenamiento moderado

column2: This character is following a moderate combat training schedule
column6: Este personaje sigue un programa de entrenamiento de combate moderado.

column2: Intensive Training
column6: Entrenamiento intensivo

column2: This character is following an intensive combat training schedule
column6: Este personaje sigue un programa intensivo de entrenamiento de combate.

column2: Combat Training
column6: Entrenamiento de combate

column2: I have decided to invest a significant portion of my time to hone my combat skills. My training can be approached from two different angles, tough...
column6: He decidido invertir una parte importante de mi tiempo para perfeccionar mis habilidades de combate. Mi entrenamiento se puede abordar desde dos ángulos diferentes, difíciles ...

column2: I will take my time and measure my effort
column6: Tomaré mi tiempo y mediré mi esfuerzo

column2: I will harshly delve in the intrincacies of combat
column6: Profundizaré en las intrincaciones del combate

column2: Improvement
column6: Mejora

column2: My training is paying off and I mastered a new level of combat skill. With enthusiasm I look forward to what comes next...
column6: Mi entrenamiento está dando sus frutos y domine un nuevo nivel de habilidad de combate. Con entusiasmo espero lo que viene después ...

column2: Remarkable!
column6: ¡Notable!

column2: No Improvement
column6: Sin mejora

column2: Over the past months I was unable to improve my combat skills. Lessons drag along and I feel unfocused, in spite of my efforts...
column6: En los últimos meses no pude mejorar mis habilidades de combate. Las lecciones se arrastran y me siento desenfocado, a pesar de mis esfuerzos ...

column2: I hope to improve in the future!
column6: ¡Espero mejorar en el futuro!

column2: Injury
column6: Lesión

column2: While training combat techniques I suffered an important injury. The time taken to recover will cause a setback in my training schedule...
column6: Mientras entrenaba técnicas de combate sufrí una lesión importante. El tiempo necesario para recuperarme causará un revés en mi programa de entrenamiento ...

column2: Fortunately, no infection happened

column2: As I was sparring with my master using iron weapons, I seriously miscalculated a defensive move and my hand was severely hit by my oponent's weapon. Unfortunately, several bones are broken. In spite of the best assistence provided, for all pratical effects, I have lost the use of my hand.
column6: Mientras estaba entrenando con mi maestro usando armas de hierro, calculé seriamente un movimiento defensivo y mi mano fue severamente golpeada por el arma de mi oponente. Desafortunadamente, varios huesos están rotos. A pesar de la mejor asistencia brindada, para todos los efectos prácticos, he perdido el uso de mi mano.

column6: Como perdió ambas manos, no puede continuar entrenando y perder todo el conocimiento acumulado

column6: Después de entrenar con dedicación durante tanto tiempo, logré mis objetivos, siendo un luchador bien entrenado en este momento. Ahora a otros desafíos gratificantes fuera del alcance de la lucha ...

column6: Mi entrenamiento como luchador me enseñó la disciplina mental y los nervios necesarios para convertirme en un gran luchador. Al dedicar más tiempo a este aspecto de la vida, ahora puedo convertirme en Duelista ...

column2: While training for combat, I was mistakenly hit in the head by my master. I lost my conscience and when I recovered there was a debate about draining the internal hemorrage inside my skull. With ominous thoughts, I prepared for the physician's task of drilling my forehead...
column6: Mientras entrenaba para el combate, mi maestro me golpeó por error en la cabeza. Perdí la conciencia y cuando me recuperé hubo un debate sobre el drenaje de la hemorragia interna dentro de mi cráneo. Con pensamientos ominosos, me preparé para la tarea del médico de perforar mi frente ...

column2: Oh, well...

column2: You use your diplomatic skills to persuade [From.GetTitledName] to owe you a favour. You will give away power - abstracted into modifiers - to finish the deal. Related to your character, factors influencing this choice are: Your Diplomatic Education(+), Diplomacy(+-), Socializer(+), Cheerful(+), Gregarious(+), Trusting(+), lack of Diplomatic Education(-) and Shy(-). Concerning your target, the factors are: Dour(-), Honest(-), Just(-), Wary(-), Craven(-) and Arbitrary(+)
column6: Utiliza tus habilidades diplomáticas para persuadir a [From.GetTitledName] de que te deba un favor. Darás poder, resumido en modificadores, para terminar el trato. En relación con su personaje, los factores que influyen en esta elección son: su educación diplomática (+), diplomacia (+ -), socializador (+), alegre (+), gregaria (+), confianza (+), falta de educación diplomática (- ) y timido(-). Con respecto a su objetivo, los factores son: Dour (-), Honest (-), Just (-), Wary (-), Craven (-) y Arbitrary (+)

column2: You use your business skills to persuade [From.GetTitledName] to owe you a favour. You will give away gold to finish the deal.
column6: Utiliza sus habilidades comerciales para persuadir a [From.GetTitledName] de que le deba un favor. Regalarás oro para terminar el trato.

column2: You use your culture to establish a bond with your target. If successful, you will be able to gain a favour with minor costs. Regarding yourself, the factors influencing your stance are: Your Learning Education(+), Learning Stat(+-), mystic(+), Scholar(+), Tutor(+), Diligent(+), Slothful(-) and Wroth(-). Regarding your target factors are: His Learning Education(+), Mystic(+), Tutor(+), Scholar(+), Slothful(-) and Wroth(-)
column6: Usas tu cultura para establecer un vínculo con tu objetivo. Si tiene éxito, podrá obtener un favor con costos menores. Con respecto a usted, los factores que influyen en su postura son: su educación de aprendizaje (+), estadística de aprendizaje (+ -), mística (+), erudito (+), tutor (+), diligente (+), perezoso (-) y Wroth (-). En cuanto a sus factores objetivo son: Su educación de aprendizaje (+), Mystic (+), Tutor (+), Académico (+), Slothful (-) y Wroth (-)

column2: You use your intrigue to mislead [From.GetTitledName] in order to owe you a favour. You may be able to get the favour for nothing but unpalatable consequences might happen if [From.GetSheHe] detects your scheme. This option has a lower base chance of success. Regarding yourself and to influence this option the factors are: Your Intrigue Education(+), Intrige Stat(+-), Deceitful(+), Shrewd(+), Bright(+), Quick(+), Genius(+), Honest(-), Dull(-), Dim(-), Slow(-) and Imbecile(-). Regarding your target the factors are: Dull(+), Dim(+), Slow(+), Imbecile(+), Shrewd(-), Bright(-), Quick(-) and Genius(-)
column6: Usas tu intriga para engañar a [From.GetTitledName] para hacerte un favor. Es posible que pueda obtener el favor de nada más que consecuencias desagradables que podrían suceder si [From.GetSheHe] detecta su esquema. Esta opción tiene una menor probabilidad de éxito de base. En cuanto a usted mismo e influir en esta opción, los factores son: su educación sobre intriga (+), estadística de intriga (+ -), engañosa (+), astuta (+), brillante (+), rápida (+), genio (+), Honesto (-), opaco (-), tenue (-), lento (-) e imbécil (-). Con respecto a su objetivo, los factores son: opaco (+), tenue (+), lento (+), imbécil (+), astuto (-), brillante (-), rápido (-) y genio (-)

column6: Mi postura diplomática al acercarme a [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] para deberme un favor se encontró con una seria resistencia y desprecio. Desafortunadamente, fallé en mis objetivos ...

column2: The Price of Honor

Now is the time to decide how much I will be offering [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] for [da_buy_favour_target.GetHerHis] help in the future. The more I offer, the bigger the chances of success...
I'll offer 25 gold
I'll offer 75 gold
I'll offer 250 gold
I'll offer 500 gold
Intelectual Bonds

My discussion with [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] covered many subjects of general culture and soon it was evident there was a close intelectual bond between us. This lead to the introduction of the favour being asked easier and for the very small price of some ancient parchments I was able to confirm it...
Excellent!
I refuse to pay anything for the favour...
Bad News

In spite of my best attempts, I was unable to establish an intellectual bond with [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName]. While I tried to broach the subject of a favour in the future, [da_buy_favour_target.GetSheHe] refused to engage into that line of thinking...
Unfortunately...
Successful Manipulation!

My attempt to suggest to [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] that [da_buy_favour_target.GetSheHe] owes me a favour was an unmitigated success! In the end we even finished our meeting with a sincere apology from [da_buy_favour_target.GetHerHim]!
Apology for what? Idiot!
Tried to deceive me
Unfortunate Meeting

My attempt to swindle [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] into owing me a favour went rather poorly and instead of an happy fool I faced an outraged fellow! With some luck, it will take some years to mend my blunder...
Me and my long tongue...
Buying a Man

The process was very straightforward. Once I offered the sum, [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] was quick to accept it and with a charming smile revealed [da_buy_favour_target.GetSheHe] will be delighted to help me in the future!
Great!
Determined Refusal

By approaching the subject of a future favour in such a blunt way as directly offering gold, I was unable to move [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] towards my objective. Unfortunately, I failed miserably...
It will cost some Prestige...
A New Path in Life

By using my intrigue together with the right word to turn [da_buy_favour_target.GetTitledName] more pliable to my argument, I am definitely an adept of using my communication skills to sway others to do what I want...
This is my path in life!
My interests lie in other areas...
Important Proposal

I was approached by [darkages_offer_favour.GetTitledName] suggesting me that I would owe [darkages_offer_favour.GetHerHim] a favour in the future for some gold now. I ponder whether I should accept...
It's a deal!
I am beyond that
This event happens because your regent has some less than desirable personality traits and/or has a bad opinion about you. If your regent is Proud this event has a bigger chance of happening
The Vanity of the Regent

While [da_regent.GetTitledName] has the full reigns of the country, [da_regent.GetSheHe] has squandered the treasury in the most obnoxious ways, improving [da_regent.GetHerHis] prestige at my expense. Never my realm was so present in neighbours gossip, but never so much was expended in so futile way...
Oh no!

This event happens because your regent has some less than desirable personality traits and/or has a bad opinion about you. If your regent is Hedonist or Lustful this event has a bigger chance of happening
Destitute Ruling

As [da_regent.GetTitledName] leads the country as the regent, [da_regent.GetTitledName] has organized ever more scandalous parties in the palace. Rumours about all sorts of sordid behaviour abound, where alchool, sex and drugs from far away places take the centerstage on the politics of my Realm. As a side effect, my reputation suffers grievously...
The rat!
The whore!
Alliance Proposal

[da_ai_offer_alliance.GetTitledName] approached me recently with a proposal to seal an alliance between us. In the end, [da_ai_offer_alliance.GetSheHe] promised lasting friendship and help in times of need. Of course there is a price to pay for such agreement
It is a deal, then!
Sorry, but no...

Due to the incompetence of your regent all the provinces of your demesne will turn rebellious (lowest level of stability). This event has only a chance of happening if the Stewardship of the Regent is lower than 12. With lower than 8 in Stewardship the chances of this event happening are much bigger, the lower the score.
Poor Regency
This character rule passed through a particular incompetent Regency that left lasting effects on the character infamy
An Incompetent Regent

As times passes, [da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, reveals [da_regent.GetHerHim]self more and more as an incompetent in managing my assets and interests. I feel powerless to stop the disarray my realm is engulfed in and unfortunately, [da_regent.GetHerHis] mismanagement caused a certain level of infamy to stick to my own name...
Oh no!
A Lost Title

[da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, has a longstanding friendship with [da_lucky_bastard.GetTitledName]. Unfortunately for my interests and using [da_regent.GetHerHis] full powers, [da_regent.GetSheHe] decided to grant one of my titles to [da_regent.GetHerHis] friend under some nebulous concept of 'good deeds performed'. I am the one standing to lose...
Oh no!
Your Regent decided to bestow one of your count titles upon [da_regent.GetHerHis] friend. If your Regent is Charitable or lacks a Stewardship Education this event has an increased chance of happening
Religious Outcast
This character was very significantly hindered in religious matters by an incompetent Regent that tarnished permanently his image when dealign with ecclesiastical characters
A Religious Pariah

[da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, has involved [da_regent.GetHerHim]self in a vicious struggle against the ecclesiastical authorities. As [da_regent.GetSheHe] sought support using all sorts of devious tactics, my name was permanently linked to [da_regent.GetHerHis] options and the religious authorities now have a very poor opinion that will stick with me for the foreseable time...
Oh no!
Return to the Fold
My religious fervour was noticed by the ecclesiastical authorities and I am now looked on in a much better light
Rejoyce!
You are able to get rid of the nasty 'Religious Outcast' modifier because you recently gained the Zealous personal trait
Impressive Liege
This character had the luck of having a competent Regent that promoted the image of his Liege with his vassals
Admirable Soul
This character had the luck of having a competent Regent that promoted the image of his Liege with the religious authorities
Shrewd Investments
This character had the luck of having a competent Regent that promoted the investments of the realm in a very profitable way and for a long time
A Competent Regent

[da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, has demonstrated to be extremely competent advancing my interests among my vassals with utmost efficiency. I will collect the fruits of [da_regent.GetHerHis] labour for a long time...

[da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, has demonstrated to be extremely competent advancing my interests among the religious authorities with utmost efficiency. I will collect the fruits of [da_regent.GetHerHis] labour for a long time...

[da_regent.GetTitledName], my Regent, has demonstrated to be extremely competent advancing my financial interests over the long run with utmost efficiency. I will collect the fruits of [da_regent.GetHerHis] labour for a long time...
I can only be very grateful to [da_regent.GetHerHim]!
Loan Resolved
As I am very close to passing away, the loan I offered must now be resolved and certainly my next of kin will benefit from the deal...
I rest in (financial) peace!
Loan Resolved
As I am very close to passing away, the money I borrowed from [da_ai_lender.GetTitledName] must be paid in full, with the interest for this year included...
A burden passed to my next of kin
If you have less than half of the money borrowed in your treasury you will be considered bankrupt with significant penalties applied, besides going heavily into negative funds
Loan Resolved
As my lender passed away, the money I borrowed must be paid in full, with the interest for this year included...
An unexpected expense...

Yearly I will be charged an interest and will be given the opportunity to repay the loan if I have enough funds. Beware that if either the borrower or the lender die, the loan is resolved and you - or your heir - will have to pay the full sum plus the year's interest
Claim Pending
This province is the target of a claim attempt by a landed character
Claim Attempt

As [darkages_spymaster_name.GetTitledName], my [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle], works on the target province, I decided to attempt to lay a claim there, personally getting involved in the process while using my skills to benefit in the long run
I'll use a Diplomatic approach
I'll employ Subterfuge
The migration system will be turned off
§BDARK AGES:§! Easter Celebration
Easter can be celebrated using the relevant decision in the appropriate months
Easter celebration will be removed from the game to adapt it better to some mods - for instance, A Game of Thrones, where there is no Easter
Unexpected Help

As I was travelling around my demesne, I was approached by none other as [da_voter.GetTitledName] with a very good suggestion regarding the personal claim I am working on. There is a price to pay for such help but it might increase the chances of success in the future...
I may offer a lump sum to [da_voter.GetHerHim]
I may owe [da_voter.GetHerHim] a favour
I can always dismiss such help
Unexpected Hindrance
In spite of my best efforts to lay a claim on the province previously selected, there is a powerful outsider that seems to thwart my best attempts...
Accept the situation as it is
Organize the murder of the individual
This option leads you to accept a penalty on your chances of laying a claim in the future
This option can nullify any penalties for your claim in the future if successful. Otherwise, unpalatable consequences will be felt
Success!
My attempt to assassinate the individual that was attempting to cripple mt claim operation was a sucess! I don't have to worry about it anymore...
Excellent!
Failure...
My attempt to assassinate the individual that was attempting to cripple mt claim operation was a failure! These are indeed bad news...
Oh no!
A New Rival
As my claim proccess advances, I noted the interests of [da_aggrieved_individual.GetTitledName] were being placed in check, up to the point of forming a new rivalry...
I need friends, not enemies...
Love is in the Air

Over the course of my new claim, I passed a long time with [da_new_lover.GetTitledName]. In time things start getting a bit more intimate and as of now it is clear we may fall in love with each other...
I'll allow the love to happen
I'll refrain my sentiments
A Deadly Challenge

As I was going about the province of my new claim in order to further my interests, I was suddenly attacked by a group of thugs, probably sent by none other than the province owner. I need to fight for my life!
Together with my retinue, I'll stand and fight
I'll run away as fast as a I can!
The Enemy Within

My trusty [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] reported there is someone within the court that is moving heaven and earth to foil my attempt to claim the province previously selected. Unfortunately, his name has not beed discovered...
We will act at a disadvantage...
A Master Forgery

One day I was approached by my [Root.job_spymaster.GetJobTitle] that brought to my presence an individual with unusual talents. The proposal would be to forge a documen t that legitimates my claim to the province I targeted earlier...
It is expensive but worth it!
I'll not deal in such matters...
Successful Negotiation
Successful action
Failed action
Succcessful meeting
Failed meeting

As lots of mental work must be done to unveil the claim, the chance for this action to be successful, thus increasing significantly mt chances of success, depends on Diplomacy(+,-) and Realm Diplomacy(+,-)
Poor Image Abroad
My efforts to claim the provoince I selected previously are being very poorly received in foreign courts. My greed certainly doesn't help my standing...
It is what it is...
An International Meeting

As I took a diplomatic approach to fulfill my desire to claim a new province, I am finally organizing the meeting with several Lords from abroad to present my case. While this meeting is not decisive to my success, if it runs well, it is certainly a powerful card I can play
Let the meeting begin!
Success!
The nasty individual that was thwarting my plans to forge a new claim has been dealt with and now that I got rid of him, mt success chances improved for sure
Excellent!
Loan in Effect
A loan in effect is burdening this character's finances
Failure
The assassination attempt was a failure and now the nasty individual preventing my claim is acting with double the effort!
Unfortunately...
Success!
The mettings with foreign dignitaries to further my claim was a success and they left my palace with the notion of my own rights over that piece of territory!
Great!
Failure
Unfortunately, my attempts to sway the foreign dignitaries during the international meeting were not successful. Certainly my claim will be harder to achieve now...
A pity...
The chance for this action to be successful depends on Intrigue(+,-) and Realm Intrigue(+,-)
Successful action
Failed action

As lots of mental work must be done to unveil a claim, in order to increase the chances of being successful, the Intrigue Stat(+-) of the character and the Realm Intrigue(+-) score are powerful modifiers for this action
This is the definite moment when the claim demanded by myself will be heavily tipped in my favour. Its success depends heavily on the Intrigue(+-) of the character and its Realm Intrigue(+-)
Let's give the performance of a life time!
The Claim Unfolds

My plan to forge a claim in a foreign province was successful thanks to a variety of different factors. My possible high Learning skill, events that happened along the way and even luck, all influenced this positive outcome!
column16: My plan to forge a claim in a foreign province was successful thanks to a variety of different factors. My Learning skill,, evewnts that happened along the way and even luck, all influenced this positive outcome!

column2: My plan to forge a claim in a foreign province was a disaster compounded by several factos My possibly lack of Learning, penalizing events along the way and bad luck, all conspired to this failed outcome...
Marvellous!
Rats!
Claim Province

Once your spymaster is given the task to Sabotage a Province you can order him to try to forge a claim in his assigned province. A long time, measured in years, might pass and many things can happen while the process takes its course. Given the cultural angle of such claims, the Learning of your chaqracter together with the Realm Learning are powerful modifiers for this action to produce good results
Failed Mission

Unfortunately, the subterfuge mission I planned when first stating my new claim went from bad to worse, with my plans clearly exposed. This will not help in the final outcome but the wholel endeavour has not failed yet!
Lets see if luck is on our side
Successful Mission
My subterfuge plan to claim the province I want has gone in the best of ways, which will help tre,medously the final chance of success of my endeavour!
Good news!
§BDARK AGES:§! Appalling Stats
Due to limits to the AI capabilities, only the player will suffer the additional penalties of having appalling stats (less than 5 in any stat)
All
Even at the price of further crippling the AI - it can't use the focus to overcome it - all landed characters will suffer the appalling stats penalty (less than 5 in any stat)
Already Refused Invitation
I don't have the gold right now
